ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-28 22:07:31. [Issue ID 2567982]
ComicInfo.Summary: Willy's Wonderland writer G.O. Parsons and visionary artist Carlos Rod reunite to deliver the climactic finale of the thrilling three-part series... Beast of Bower Boulevard. As the survivors face the relentless onslaught of the fearsome Beast, a glimmer of hope emerges in a hidden arsenal of cutting-edge weaponry. With no reinforcements coming, their only recourse is to fight back. Brace yourselves for an epic showdown featuring the fiery spectacle of laser cannons, bone-cutting buzzsaws, and a cache of firepower capable of leveling a city! Don't miss out on this electrifying conclusion that will leave readers on the edge of their seats!
